utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Alright. Phoebe?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, okay. If I were omnipotent for a day, I would want, um, world peace, no more hunger, good things for the rain-forest...And bigger boobs!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, see.. you took mine. Chandler, what about you?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Uh, if I were omnipotent for a day, I'd.. make myself omnipotent forever.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: See, there's always one guy. "If I had a wish, I'd wish for three more wishes."

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Hey Joey. Hi. Hey, buddy.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey, Joey, what would you do if you were omnipotent?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Probably kill myself!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: ..Excuse me?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, if Little Joey's dead, then I got no reason to live!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Joey, uh- OMnipotent.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You are? Ross, I'm sorry..

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: How does she do that?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I cannot sleep in a public place.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Would you look at her? She is so peaceful.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh! What what what! ...Hi.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It's okay, y'know, you just nodded off again.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What's going on with you?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I got no sleep last night!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Why?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: My grandmother has this new boyfriend, and they're both kind of insecure in bed. Oh, and deaf. So they're constantly, like, having to reassure each other that they're having a good time. You have no idea how loud they are!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, if you want, you can stay with Rachel and me tonight.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Thanks.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: ...Ninety-five, ninety-six, ninety-seven. See, I told you! Less than a hundred steps from our place to here.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You got waaaay too much free time.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey! Here's the birthday boy! Ross, check it out: hockey tickets, Rangers-Penguins, tonight at the Garden, and we're taking you.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Happy birthday, pal!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: We love you, man.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Funny, my birthday was seven months ago.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: So?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So, I'm guessing you had an extra ticket and couldn't decide which one of you got to bring a date?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, aren't we Mr. "The glass is half empty."

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh my God, oh- is today the twentieth, October twentieth?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, I was hoping you wouldn't remember.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ohhh.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What's wrong with the twentieth?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Eleven days before Halloween.. all the good costumes are gone?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Today's the day Carol and I first.. consummated our physical relationship. Sex. ..You know what, I-I'd better pass on the game. I think I'm just gonna go home and think about my ex-wife and her lesbian lover.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: The hell with hockey, let's all do that!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: C'mon, Ross! You, me, Joey, ice, guys' night out, c'mon, whaddya say, big guy, Huh? Huh? Huh?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What are you doing?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I have no idea.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: C'mon, Ross!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Alright, alright, maybe it'll take my mind off it. Do you promise to buy me a big thumb finger?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You got it.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Look-look-look-look-look, my first pay check! Look at the window, there's my name! Hi, me!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I remember the day I got my first pay check. There was a cave in in one of the mines, and eight people were killed.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wow, you worked in a mine?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I worked in a Dairy Queen, why?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: God, isn't this exciting? I earned this. I wiped tables for it, I steamed milk for it, and it was totally——not worth it. Who's FICA? Why's he getting all my money? I mean, what- Chandler, look at that.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, this is not that bad.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, you're fine, yeah, for a first job.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You can totally, totally live on this.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, yeah.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, by the way, great service tonight.

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Oh! Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Guys
utterance.content: Hockey! Hockey! Hockey.

utterance.speaker: Leslie
utterance.content: Rachel?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God! (Rachel, Leslie, Kiki, and Joanne all scream and hug each other.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I swear I've seen birds do this on Wild Kingdom.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What are you guys doing here?

utterance.speaker: Kiki
utterance.content: Well, we were in the city shopping, and your mom said you work here, aaand it's true!

utterance.speaker: Joanne
utterance.content: Look at you in the apron. You look like you're in a play.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Look at you, you are so big I can't believe it!

utterance.speaker: Leslie
utterance.content: I know. I know! I'm a duplex.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So what's going on with you?

utterance.speaker: Joanne
utterance.content: Well, guess who my dad's making partner in his firm?

utterance.speaker: Kiki
utterance.content: And while we're on the subject of news..

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Look, look, I have elbows!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: ...Poulet passes it up to Leetch!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Leetch spots Messier in the crease- there's the pass!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: We'll take a brief time out while Messier stops to look at some women's shoes.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Carol was wearing boots just like those the night that we- we first- y'know. Fact, she, uh- she never took'em off, 'cause we-we- Sorry. Sorry.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Peach pit.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes, Bunny?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Peach pit. That night we, uh- we had-

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: -Peaches?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Actually, nectarines, but basically...

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Could've been a peach.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Then, uh, then we got dressed, and I-I... I walked her to the- -the bus stop... I'm fine.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, that woman's got an ass like Carol's! What? Thought we were trying to find stuff.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So c'mon, you guys, tell me all the dirt!

utterance.speaker: Kiki
utterance.content: Well, the biggest news is still you dumping Barry at the altar!

utterance.speaker: Joanne
utterance.content: Alright. Let's talk reality for a second.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Joanne
utterance.content: When are you coming home?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What? Guys, I'm not.

utterance.speaker: Joanne
utterance.content: C'mon, this is us.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I'm not! This is what I'm doing now. I've got this job-

utterance.speaker: Kiki
utterance.content: Waitressing?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, I'm not just waitressing. I'm.. I, um... I write the specials on the specials board, and, uh... and I, uh... I take the uh dead flowers out of the vase... Oh, and, um, sometimes Artelle lets me put the little chocolate blobbies on the cookies.

utterance.speaker: Leslie
utterance.content: Well. Your mom didn't tell us about the blobbies.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey, Rach. How was it with your friends? Okay! How would you like some Tiki Death Punch?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What's that?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Weeeell, it's rum, and-

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: We thought since Phoebe was staying over tonight we'd have kinda like a slumber party thing. We got some trashy magazines, we got cookie dough, we got Twister...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ooh! Ooh! And I brought Operation! But, um, I lost the tweezers, so we can't operate. But we can prep the guy!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Uh, Rach, it's the Visa card people.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, God, ask them what they want.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Could you please tell me what this is in reference to? Yes, hold on. Um, they say there's been some unusual activity on your account.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: But I haven't used my card in weeks!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That is the unusual activity. Look, they just wanna see if you're okay.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: They wanna know if I'm okay. Okay.. they wanna know if I'm okay, okay, let's see. Well, let's see, the FICA guys took all my money, everyone I know is either getting married, or getting promoted, or getting pregnant, and I'm getting coffee! And it's not even for me! So if that sounds like I'm okay, okay, then you can tell them I'm okay, okay?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Uh- Rachel has left the building, can you call back?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Alright, c'mon! Let's play Twister!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Sorry, sorry... Uh-oh.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What? There was ice there that night with Carol? Plastic seats? Four thousand angry Pittsburgh fans?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, actually I was just saying it looks like we're not sitting together. But now you mention it, there was ice there that night... It was the first frost...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: C'mon, sit. Just sit down, sit.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You should feel great about yourself! You're doing this amazing independence thing!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Monica, what is so amazing? I gave up, like, everything. And for what?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You are just like Jack.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: ...Jack from downstairs?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No, Jack and the Beanstalk.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ah, the other Jack.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, right! See, he gave up something, but then he got those magic beans. And then he woke up, and there was this, this big plant outside his window, full of possibilities and stuff.. And he lived in a village, and you live in the Village..

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, but Pheebs, Pheebs, Jack gave up a cow, I gave up an orthodontist. Okay, I-I-I know, I know I didn't love him-

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, see, Jack did love the cow.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: But see, it was a plan. Y'know, it was clear. It was figured out, and now everything's just kinda like...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Floopy?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: So what, you're not the only one. I mean, half the time we don't know where we're going. You've just gotta figure at some point it's all gonna come together, and it's just gonna be... un-floopy.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, like that's a word.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, but Monica, what if- what if it doesn't come together?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: ...Pheebs?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, well... 'cause.... you just... I don't like this question.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, see, see, you guys, what if we don't get magic beans? I mean, what if all we've got are.. beans?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Get him! GET HIM! Get him! Get- YESSS! Not laughing now, are ya pal!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: See buddy, that's all you need, a bunch of toothless guys hitting each other with sticks.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Pass it! Pass it!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: He's open!

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Shoot! Shoot! Shoot!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey, look, we're on that TV thing!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: 'Scuse me.

utterance.speaker: Receptionist
utterance.content: It says to call this number if you're not completely satisfied with this candy bar. Well, I'm not completely satisfied.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Listen, it's kind of an emergency. Well, I guess you know that, or we'd be in the predicament room.

utterance.speaker: Receptionist
utterance.content: Hold on. Fill these out, sit over there.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Look, I don't wanna make any trouble, okay, but I'm in a lot of pain here, alright? My face is dented.

utterance.speaker: Receptionist
utterance.content: Well, you'll have to wait your turn.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, how long do you think it'll be?

utterance.speaker: Receptionist
utterance.content: Any minute now.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, this- Heyy...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I'm so sorry, you guys. I didn't mean to bring you down.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No, you were right. I don't have a plan.

utterance.speaker: Pizza Guy
utterance.content: Pizza guy!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Thank God. Food.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Phoebe?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Do you have a plan?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I don't even have a 'pl'.

utterance.speaker: Pizza Guy
utterance.content: Hi, one, uh, mushroom, green pepper and onion?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, no, that's not what we ordered... We ordered a fat-free crust with extra cheese.

utterance.speaker: Pizza Guy
utterance.content: Wait, you're not 'G.Stephanopoulos?' Man, my dad's gonna kill me!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wait! Did you say 'G.Stephanopoulos?'

utterance.speaker: Pizza Guy
utterance.content: Yeah. This one goes across the street, I must have given him yours. Oh, bonehead, bonehead!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wait, was this a-a small mediterranean guy with curiously intelligent good looks?

utterance.speaker: Pizza Guy
utterance.content: Yeah, that sounds about right.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Was he wearing a stunning blue suit?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: And-and a power tie?

utterance.speaker: Pizza Guy
utterance.content: No, pretty much just a towel.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh God.

utterance.speaker: Pizza Guy
utterance.content: So you guys want me to take this back?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Are you nuts?! We've got George Stephanopoulos' pizza!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Uh, Pheebs? Who's George Snuffalopagus?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Big Bird's friend.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I see pizza!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, I wanna see! Lemme see! Lemme see!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hello? Who are we spying on?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: White House adviser? Clinton's campaign guy? The one with the great hair, sexy smile, really cute butt?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, him, the little guy? Oh, I love him!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ooh, wait.. wait, I see a woman.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Please tell me it's his mother.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Definitely not his mother.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, no...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, wait, she's walking across the floor.. she's walking.. she's walking.. she's going for the pizza- Hey, that's not for you, bitch!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Excuse me, look, we've been here for over an hour, and a lot of people less sick than my friend have gone in. I mean, that guy with the toe thing? Who's he sleeping with? Oh, c'mon Dora, don't be mad... I know we both said some things we didn't mean, but that doesn't mean we still don't love each other. Y'know, I feel like I've lost her.. Ba-!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Light still out?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh. Maybe they're- napping.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh please, they're having sex.

utterance.speaker: Monica and Phoebe
utterance.content: Shut up!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So, whaddya think George is like?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I think he's shy.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah. I think you have to draw him out. And then- when you do- he's a preppy animal.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I remember the moonlight coming through the window- and her face had the most incredible glow.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes, the moon, the glow, the magical feeling, you did this part- Could I get some painkillers over here, please?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: He's right, enough, already. What is the big deal about today? So you slept with her for the first time, so what? You slept with her for seven years after that.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Look, it's just a little more complicated...

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, what? What? What is it? That she left you? That she likes women? That she left you for another woman that likes women?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Little louder, okay, I think there's a man on the twelfth floor in a coma that didn't quite hear you...

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Then what?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: My first time with Carol was...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It was my first time.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: With Carol? Oh.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So in your whole life, you've only been with one——oh.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Whoah, boy, hockey was a big mistake! There was a whole bunch of stuff we could've done tonight!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay. Okay, I got one. Do you remember that vegetarian pate that I made that you loved so much?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Uh-huh.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, unless goose is a vegetable...ha haaaah!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh! Oh! Oh! Okay, fine, fine. Now I don't feel so bad about sleeping with Jason Hurley.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?! You slept with Jason?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You'd already broken up.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: How long?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: A couple hours.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, that's nice!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, okay, okay, I got one! Anyway- The valentine Tommy Rollerson left in your locker was really from me.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Excuse me?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hello? Like he was really gonna send you one? She was a big girl.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Really. Well, at least 'big girls' don't pee in their pants in seventh grade!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I was laughing! You made me laugh!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: There he is! There he is!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Where?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Right- where we've been looking all night!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: He is so cute!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, George, baby, drop the towel!

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Yeah, drop it! Drop the towel! Please drop the——wowww.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Man. Can you believe he's only had sex with one woman?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I think it's great. Y'know, it's sweet, it's romantic...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No, you kidding? The guy's a freak..

utterance.speaker: Both
utterance.content: Hey, buddy.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Receptionist
utterance.content: Oh, that's attractive.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, I thought you were great in Silence of the Lambs. Oh come on, admit it! All things considered, you had fun tonight.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Fun? Where was the fun? Tell me specifically, which part was the fun part? Where's my puck?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, ah- the kid has it.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: The kid...? Excuse me, uh, that's, that's my puck.

utterance.speaker: Kid
utterance.content: I found it. Finders keepers, losers weepers.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You gotta do it, man.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh yeah? Well, I'm rubber, you're glue, whatever——can't do it. Listen, uh- gimme back my puck.

utterance.speaker: Kid
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: 'Yes', how about. C'mere. Gimme!

utterance.speaker: Kid
utterance.content: No! No!

utterance.speaker: Receptionist
utterance.content: Hey! Hey! No rough holding in my ER!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: GIVE ME MY PUCK!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: ...Now that was fun.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, Monica: Right foot red.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Could've played Monopoly, but nooooo.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Thanks.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, Pheebs: Right hand blue. Good.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hello? Oh, uh, Rachel, it's the Visa card people.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, okay. Will you take my place?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Alright. Yes, this is Rachel.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Nooo! Hello? Oh, yeah, no, I know, I-I haven't been using it much. Oh, well, thanks, but, I'm okay, really.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Green. To the green.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I've got magic beans. Never-never mind.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: To the left, to the left- aww!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohhh... I'm fine.
